General_information.Content: This database contains data from international key comparisons for radionuclide metrology since the inception of the international system of reference (SIR) for radionuclide metrology at the BIPM in 1976.
General_information.Note: This version of the machine-readable comparison report is not definitive. The format is under discussion within the CCRI and CIPM to best reflect the requirements of ionizing radiation metrology and to conform to the SI digital framework. Users can use this document to analyse key comparison data and metadata more efficiently with their software. However, users should bear in mind that the format will necessarily evolve in subsequent updates of this key comparison, which will not guarantee the long-term compatibility of their interface.

References.key: Romain Coulon et al 2022 Meas. Sci. Technol. 33 024003 - https://doi.org/10.1088/1361-6501/ac3fc4
Romain Coulon et al 2023 Meas. Sci. Technol. 34 074009 - https://doi.org/10.1088/1361-6501/accd0b

key.name: Key comparison BIPM.RI(II)-K1.Ce-139(2003)
key.Reference_of_the_published_comparison_re: Ratel G., Michotte C., BIPM comparison BIPM.RI(II)-K1.Ce-139 of activity measurements of the radionuclide $^{139}$Ce and links for the 1976 international comparison CCRI(II)-K2.Ce-139, \href{https://doi.org/10.1088/0026-1394/40/1A/06012}{\textit{Metrologia}, 2003, \textbf{40}, Tech. Suppl., 06012}

key.name: Key comparison BIPM.RI(II)-K1.Ce-139(2005)
key.Reference_of_the_published_comparison_re: Ratel G., Michotte C., Hino Y., Update of the BIPM comparison BIPM.RI(II)-K1.Ce-139 of activity measurements of the radionuclide $^{139}$Ce to include the 2004 NMIJ result and links for the 2004 regional comparison APMP.RI(II)-K2.Ce-139, \href{https://doi.org/10.1088/0026-1394/42/1A/06012}{\textit{Metrologia}, 2005, \textbf{42}, Tech. Suppl., 06012}

key.name: Key comparison BIPM.RI(II)-K1.Ce-139(2011)
key.Reference_of_the_published_comparison_re: Ratel G., Michotte C., Kossert K., N\"{a}hle, Maringer F.J., Update of the BIPM comparison BIPM.RI(II)-K1.Ce-139 of activity measurements of the radionuclide $^{139}$Ce to include the 2008 results of the PTB, Germany and the BEV, Austria, \href{https://doi.org/10.1088/0026-1394/48/1A/06019}{\textit{Metrologia}, 2011, \textbf{48}, Tech. Suppl., 06019}

key.name: Key comparison BIPM.RI(II)-K1.Ce-139(2022)
key.Reference_of_the_published_comparison_re: Coulon R., Michotte C., Courte S., Nonis M., Judge S., Thiam C., Bobin C., Fr\'echou C., van Rooy M.W., van Staden M.J. and Lubbe J., Update of the BIPM comparison BIPM.RI(II)-K1.Ce-139 of activity measurements of the radionuclide $^{139}$Ce to include the 2019 result of the NMISA (South Africa) and the 2022 result of the LNE-LNHB (France), \href{https://doi.org/10.1088/0026-1394/59/1A/06019}{\textit{Metrologia}, 2022, \textbf{59}, Tech. Suppl., 06019}

key.name: Linked comparison APMP.RI(II)-K2.Ce-139(2004)
key.Reference_of_the_linked_comparison: Hino Y., Park T.S., Yuen M.C., Yuandi Y., Simpson B., van Wyngaardt W.M., Kharitonov I.A., 2005, APMP comparison of the activity measurements of Ce139, APMP/TCRI-II Report Ce-139, \href{https://www.bipm.org/cc/CCRI(II)/Allowed/18/CCRI(II)05-33.pdf}{CCRI(II)/05-33}.
